name: Asclepias syriaca
Relationship: Compare: Asclepias Vincetoxicum. Swallow-wart - Cynanchum - (A gastrointestinal irritant, producing vomiting and purgation. - (Useful in dropsy, diabetes, great thirst, profuse urination.

Head: Headache from retention of effete matters in system
Feels as if a SHARP INSTRUMENT WERE THRUST THROUGH FROM TEMPLE TO TEMPLE
Nervous headache, after suppressed perspiration, followed by INCREASED URINE, WITH INCREASE OF SPECIFIC GRAVITY
Constriction across forehead

details: Seems to act especially on nervous system and urinary organs. A remedy for dropsy, hepatic, renal or cardiac and post-scarlatinal; causes diaphoresis and augments the urinary secretion. Acute rheumatic inflammation of large joints. Intermittent, pressing-down uterine pains.
